Name: Spring Falls
About the game: Spring Falls is a puzzle game about water, erosion, and watching things grow. Manipulate the landscape and bring wildflowers to life as you make your way down a peaceful mountainside. Soft visuals, ambient guitar work, and environmental sounds come together to create a meditative, relaxing experience. Features: • 60 hand-crafted levels • Unique gameplay revolving around water flow • Ambient-folk soundtrack and organic atmospheric sounds • Gorgeous mountain vista backdrops
